categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Lieutenant Isric was a male Human Imperial soldier during the Cold War. He served aboard Grand Moff Rycus Kilran's ship, and he achieved the rank of Lieutenant by the year 3643 BBY. During the assault on the Republic cruiser Esseles to capture Ambassador Vyn Asara, Isric led the Imperial boarding party that was in actuality a distraction for Ironfist's Mandalorian troops. While Ironfist's forces were seizing the bridge, Isric and his troops were killed by a group of Republic defenders.
